title: alacritty crashed with freetype-2.12.1 on gentoo
body:
For bug reports, the following information can help speed up the process. Please
describe the bug that you have found and what you would expect to happen
instead.

My alacritty cannot run as usually after update freetype-2.12.1 in my laptop, it run and crashed every times.

### System

OS: 
Linux Amazing 5.15.52-gentoo-dist #1 SMP Fri Jul 22 04:01:28 -00 2022 x86_64 Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1545M v5 @ 2.90GHz GenuineIntel GNU/Linux
Version: alacritty 0.10.1 ()
Linux/BSD: Xorg-X11 7.4-r3, i3wm with picom

### Logs

Crashes: 
"thread 'main' panicked at 'attempt to subtract with overflow', alacritty/src/renderer/builtin_font.rs:369:38"
